mapper.select: select USER_ID, TAR_ORDER_PRICE, REC_PROD_NAME, ORDER_PERIOD, COUPON_MIN, COUPON_DENO, SMS_CONTENT from UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL where head_id = #{headId}::int4 order by COUPON_DENO,COUPON_MIN, DAILY_DETAIL_ID asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(1) from UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL where head_id = #{headId}::int4
select DAILY_DETAIL_ID id, SMS_CONTENT as content from UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL where head_id = #{headId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UO_OP_PUSH_LIST(USER_PHONE,USER_OPENID,PUSH_CONTENT,PUSH_STATUS,SOURCE_CODE,SOURCE_ID,PUSH_PERIOD,IS_PUSH) select C.USER_PHONE, C.USER_OPENID, C.SMS_CONTENT, 'P', 'D', C.DAILY_DETAIL_ID, C.PUSH_ORDER_PERIOD::int4, '0' FROM UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL C WHERE C.HEAD_ID = #{headId}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER T1, UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL T2 WHERE T1.HEAD_ID=T2.HEAD_ID AND T1.HEAD_ID=#{headId}

select T1.HEAD_ID, T2.DAILY_DETAIL_ID, T2.USER_ID, T2.USER_PHONE, T2.USER_OPENID, SMS.SMS_CONTENT, T2.REC_PROD_ID, T2.REC_PROD_NAME, T2.COUPON_ID, T2.GROWTH_STRATEGY_ID, T3.IS_COUPON, T2.REC_PIECE_PRICE, T2.GROUP_ID FROM UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER T1, UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL T2, UO_OP_DAILY_TEMPLATE_CONFIG T3, UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE SMS WHERE T1.HEAD_ID = T2.HEAD_ID AND T2.GROUP_ID = T3.GROUP_ID AND T3.SMS_CODE = SMS.SMS_CODE AND T1.HEAD_ID = #{headId} ORDER BY T2.DAILY_DETAIL_ID DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL set (sms_content,coupon_id,coupon_min,coupon_deno) = (select sms_content,coupon_id,coupon_min,coupon_deno from UO_OP_DAILY_CONTENT_TMP where UO_OP_DAILY_CONTENT_TMP.daily_detail_id = UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL.daily_detail_id and UO_OP_DAILY_CONTENT_TMP.head_id=UO_OP_DAILY_DETAIL.head_id) where head_id=#{headId}
